attributes.action: Strip Bob Geldof of his Knighthood for his behavior against fisherman protesting
attributes.background: Knighthood, A knight, the rank associated with the ideals of chivalry, a code of conduct for the perfect courtly Christian.. "A chivalrous man of honor"  Bob Geldof's behavior sticking up two fingers at the Fishermen on the Thames shows he has no right to the title and should be stripped of it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
